name: df-transport
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ctransport, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wrex(s3, cn, wa(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(cfv(cee, cv(s3)), cfv(cee, cv(s3)))), wcel(cv(s1), cxp(cfv(cee, cv(s3)), cfv(cee, cv(s3)))), wne(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(s2), crio(s4, cfv(cee, cv(s3)), wa(wbr(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cbtwn, cop(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cv(s4))), wbr(cop(cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cv(s4)), ccgr, cv(s0)))))))))
comment: Define the segment transport function. See ~ fvtransport for an explanation of the function. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Oct-2013.)
